name: Above Stars and Beyond Dreams
summary:
Language: Japanese
Genre: 2Step, Electro, and Bossanova
Size: 160MB
Provided By RB STUDIOS
Brought U By JPz Records
Description: 
A live unofficial mixset that was recorded and stream for Vocaloid Fans across Japan by Revolution Boi. Now it has be rendered and recorded for listeners all over the world. Go above and beyond and enjoy the computerize vocals from Hatsune Miku and the lovely KOKO, all mixed up for your listening pleasures.
info:
• 表演者: Revolution Boi
  • 发售日期: 2010
  • 碟片数量: 1
